skills.name: Tengu's Strategy A
skills.detail: Increase all allies' NP Gain (3 turns)

skills.name: Art of the Swallow B
skills.detail: Apply Evade (1 turn) & increase C. Star Drop Rate (1 turn) for yourself

skills.name: Tengu's Strategy EX
skills.detail: Increase NP Gain for all allies (3 turns) + Increase your Quick Card effectiveness (3 turns) ▲

noblePhantasms.name: Dan-No-Ura Eight-Boat Leap
noblePhantasms.detail: Deal significant damage to a single enemy + greatly increase C. Star Drop Rate (3 turns) <effect increases with Overcharge> for yourself

comments.comment:
A military commander with a story so tragic you could say everyone in Japan knows her name.
Although she was gifted with both talent and charisma, she was abandoned by her brother, Yoritomo, and was defeated along with her retainers including Benkei.
Ushiwakamaru was the childhood name of Minamoto-no-Yoshitsune.

Height/Weight: 168cm, 55kg
Origin: Gikeiki, The Tale of the Heike
Region: Japan
Alignment: Chaotic-Balanced
Gender: Female
She mounts a horse named Tayuuguro.

It wouldn't been an exaggeration to say that Ushiwakamaru (Minamoto-no-Yoshitsune) was the most famous general in all of Japanese history.
However, history is riddled with unknowns, and her life before leading an army is unclear.

Tengu's Strategy: A
Unique skill. Derived from the tale where she learned the art of war from a Tengu.
The skill grants bonus to all close-quarters
combat abilities, Tactics, and Magic Resistance.

It is said that when she was 11, Ushiwakamaru was under the care of Kurama Temple, where she met the Onmyouji Kiichi Hougen (some theories suggest he was the Kurama Tengu), and was endowed with the knowledge of military arts. While there's no doubt that Yoshitsune was an excellent tactician, she lacked something vital.

The fear of battle itself. She never worked well with other commanders. She probably never even noticed that Yoritomo wished her death. She was a genius and never had doubt or fear in her own abilities.

The True Name of her Noble Phantasm is "The Wandering Tales of Shana-oh".
The legends of the deeds Ushiwakamaru achieved in life manifest as secret techniques. In addition to the Eight-Boat Leap, there are four more secret techniques.

voiceLines.name: Birthday
voiceLines.subtitle: Congratulations on your birthday. With age, comes wisdom.

voiceLines.name: During an Event
voiceLines.subtitle:
My intuition tells me that
something is happening.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
My lord, we must depart.
We mustn't be lazy like animals!

voiceLines.name: Conversation 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
Of course, just like my brother, I will serve you until the end's of the earth.
That is, if it pleases you my lord.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 3
voiceLines.subtitle: I understand what being a Servant entails. Please, ask me anything!

voiceLines.name: Likes
voiceLines.subtitle: My brother, Yoritomo, you ask? I look up to him!

voiceLines.name: Dislikes
voiceLines.subtitle:
I hate high places, as I am slightly afraid of them.
I never want to be anywhere high again.

voiceLines.name: About the Holy Grail
voiceLines.subtitle: I decided my wish for the Holy Grail long ago. It is for me and my brother to get along once more.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
Everything is fine, my lord.
However, even though you are my lord, I intend to scold you for your slovenly habits.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
Yoritomo, you mean my brother?
Naturally, I respect him both as a brother and a samurai. I don't mean to brag, but I can safely say he's the best brother in the world!

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
I can be playful. I was a ruffian as a child, you know? I enjoyed poking fun at adults and spend my days laughing.
But I don't do that any more, as I have self-respect!

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
I have never been afraid of combat. As I am a genius you know.
My brother often said that I could survive on any battlefield.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 5
voiceLines.subtitle: Despite being betrayed countless times, I still want to fight for somebody. My lord, if you allow it, please fight with me until... In fact, never mind.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
Benkei, is that you?
Try chanting these sutras. What? You can't do it? Then fly, fly and make me coin. What? You can't do that either?
...I see. Meet me behind the temple later if you know what's good for you.

voiceLines.name: Level up
voiceLines.subtitle: I've leveled up...

voiceLines.name: Ascension 2
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 401400_0_G020]So this is what Ascension feels like? It feels good.

voiceLines.name: Ascension 1
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 401400_0_G030]Sorry... I shall count on you again...

voiceLines.name: Ascension 3
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 401400_0_G040]I feel alive! I never thought I would get this strong...

voiceLines.name: Ascension 4
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 401400_0_G050]Look, my lord! I have reached the peak of martial arts!

voiceLines.name: Summon
text:
I am Ushiwakamaru and I have been called upon.[r]
Honoring the full devotion as a Samurai, I will do my utmost best!
voiceLines.subtitle:
I am Ushiwakamaru and I have been called upon.
Honoring the full devotion as a Samurai, I will do my utmost best!

voiceLines.name: Attack 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Hyah!

voiceLines.name: Attack 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Huh!

voiceLines.name: Attack 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Ya!

voiceLines.name: Extra Attack
voiceLines.subtitle: Evil spirits, begone!

voiceLines.name: Skill 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Now!

voiceLines.name: Skill 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Draw!

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Remember the name Ushiwakamaru.

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 2
voiceLines.subtitle: My lord, your orders!

voiceLines.name: Victory 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Phew, we fought well.

voiceLines.name: Victory 2
voiceLines.subtitle: You are nothing compared to my brother. Sort yourself out.

voiceLines.name: Damage 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Ouch!

voiceLines.name: Damage 1
voiceLines.subtitle: You!

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 1
voiceLines.subtitle: My lord... I...am...sorry...

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Brother...please...forgive me...

voiceLines.name: Command Card 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Yes sir!

voiceLines.name: Command Card 2
voiceLines.subtitle: I've got this!

voiceLines.name: Command Card 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Understood.

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm Card
voiceLines.subtitle: Try these Kiichi tactics on for size!

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 401400_0_B052,401400_0_B053]Dan-No-Ura Eight-Boat Leap!
